inputs.name: MkDocs Publisher
inputs.purpose: A simple action to build an MkDocs site and push it to the gh-pages branch. Should be easy to use.
inputs.author: DevRel Team

python-version.description: The version of Python to set up for building.

requirements-file.description: Path to the Python requirements file

page-url.description: The URL of the deployed GitHub Pages site.
